EN: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
ZH: 朝圣者＆lt; br＆gt;您很幸运能够漫步的基础。

EN: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
ZH: ＆lt; hpage＆gt;你错了，女士...现在，在许多年龄段的时候，我只知道它更好……＆lt; hpage＆gt;力量……在爪子，爪子中的照料中。力量足以让我活着，可以看到一个比我们自己更好的世界，或者按照自己的意愿创造一个世界。＆lt; hpage＆gt;那是我母亲，我的导师和你的愿望……

EN: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
ZH: 珊瑚的摇摆，＆lt; br＆gt;透明的水流，＆lt; br＆gt;在我们的河上免费的时间。

EN: ...Arrived... At last...
...Our Silk...

Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this rememberance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
ZH: 见证，第一个灯。我们拥有的唯一意味着要抵抗我们家庭永远联系的空白。从这种记忆中夺走它。烧掉自己摆脱我们悲伤的命运...

EN: ...Our strength...
...Our nature...
...One to wish our waking...

...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
ZH: ...忽略他们，女儿...他们的耳语...当然不是我的...您可以吗？

EN: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
At water’s source,<br>And coral’s heart,<br>Our lord born last to rule.
ZH: 在水的来源，＆lt; br＆gt;以及珊瑚的心脏，＆lt; br＆gt;我们的主出生于统治。

EN: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
ZH: ...她叫我们女儿...叫我们神圣...她撒谎...

EN: ...Child... Weaver...
...One mind... One union...
...Child... Spider...
...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
...Their memory...
...Bind their shells...
...Their voices... Their song...
...Raise them... Up...
...To devote... Eternal...
...Bind their souls...
...Bind them all...
...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
ZH: ...她叫我们女儿...她叫我们神圣...

EN: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
ZH: ...我们是生活...我们是成长...没有我们的世界？...

EN: ...Rise... Rise...
...Come, child... Witness our waking...

...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
ZH: ...我们要粉碎的爪子...我们的爪子统治...我们的爪子拯救了所有人...

EN: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...
Pilgrim<br>May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.<br> That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
ZH: 朝圣者＆lt; br＆gt;愿这些火焰片消散所有杂质。＆lt; br＆gt;您将被授予上面的翠绿土地上的升级。

EN: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
...Sisters... spiders... our song sustains...
...Better a child spun frail... than none...
ZH: ...更好的孩子旋转脆弱...比没有...

EN: ...Better a child spun pure... than them...
ZH: ...一个孩子比他们更好...比他们...

EN: ...They are ours... Bound forever...
...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
ZH: ...因为她的光...永恒...我们的歌维持...

EN: ...We feel it...

We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
ZH: 我们说出了《先驱大师的愿望》，“签署年龄的年龄”的结局。burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its证人。

EN: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
ZH: ...我们如何狩猎...我们如何唱歌...我的孩子们，我看到你光荣...

EN: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
ZH: ...来自我们的丝绸...一个孩子天生的忠诚...

EN: <hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
ZH: ＆lt; hpage＆gt;因此，《先驱报》也参观了这片土地...＆lt; hpage＆gt;如果他在这里，现在，巨大的变化或野蛮的结束是不可避免的。他不想看到别的...
